summary:
• Dr. Agarwal is a translational research expert with 12+ years of research experience in clinical pharmaceutical sciences, cancer stem cells, and biomarker-enabled drug discovery. 

• His current research focuses on mechanism-based translational cancer research, preclinical trials, 
   and biomarker discovery of drug response/resistance using clinically relevant 3D organoid models, 
   patient biopsies, and xenografts (PDXs) of prostate cancer and glioblastoma. 

• He has expertise in performing high-throughput drug screening, combination studies, and preclinical 
   trials for small molecules and antibody drug conjugates. 

• Dr. Agarwal has excellent technical skills and a strong background in bioinformatics and statistical 
   analysis. 

• He independently leads multi-disciplinary research teams as liaison between departments and 
   industry and uses his project management skills to meet objectives on time. 

• He effectively prioritizes multiple research activities, communicates with diverse team members and 
   manages teams with diverse personalities and skill sets. 

• He has presented to scientific and medical audiences at multiple forums, as well as to non-technical 
   audiences, resulting in multiple awards and editorial board memberships. 

• Dr. Agarwal has successfully completed collaborative projects leading to invited talks, 10 peer- 
   reviewed publications, and >10 preclinical trials of which two drugs are currently in clinical trials. 


Areas of Expertise
1) Cancer stem cells 2) Flow cytometry 3) Genomic and transcriptomic analysis 4) Biomarker discovery 5) Mechanisms of drug resistance 6) Organoid Culture 7) Patient derived xenografts 8) Bioinformatics 9) High content imaging and drug screens. 

SKILLS

Technical Skills

•	Organoid Culture   •	High throughput organoid drug screens   •	Bioinformatics   
•	Flow cytometry – multi-color/LSR    •	In vivo analysis  •	High throughput confocal imaging
•	IHC/ IF/ Western blot analysis    •	HPLC, LC-MS, fluorometry   • UV/Vis spectroscopy  
•	Data anaylsis: SAS, R, Prism  

Business and Social Skills

•	Led collaborative teams	•	Long-term relationships 	•	Mentoring students 
•	Project management	•	Managing multiple projects	•	Oral/Written communication

email: supreetagarwal@gmail.com
headline: Cancer Biologist - Expert in organoid research, stem cells, drug discovery, and data science, led cross-functional teams
